      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host,
           int port,
           java.lang.String user)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException,
                    AuthErrorException
        Connect to the given server and start receiving incoming data. This method is non-blocking as the listener runs in a new thread.
        Parameters:
        host - Server address
        port - Server port
        user - Nickname
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the IP address of the server could not be determined
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while creating I/O streams
        AuthErrorException - if the nickname is already taken

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect from server.

      • send

        public void send(Sendable obj)
        Send a given sendable object to the server.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to send
